text: Great location but very noisy at night and room was small.
Clean rooms, friendly staff. Perfect for business trips.
Noise all night from the street. Impossible to sleep. Location is perfect though.
Excellent breakfast, comfortable beds. Good value for money.
Central location, clean bathroom. Rooms are a bit cramped.
Charming district, quiet at night. Small bathroom.
Loved the area! Cozy room, great for couples.
Nice view from the window. WiFi was slow.
Staff very helpful. Room clean but dated furniture.
Authentic Paris experience. No elevator, stairs only.
Luxury feel, excellent service. Worth every euro.
Best hotel in Le Marais. Clean, stylish, great location.
Perfect for shopping. Staff went above and beyond.
Beautiful room, rooftop terrace amazing. Pricey but worth it.
Impeccable cleanliness. Best sleep I had in Paris.
Cheap but the room was dirty. Stains on the carpet.
Close to metro, that's the only plus. Bathroom needs renovation.
Budget option, you get what you pay for. Noisy neighbors.
Unsafe feeling area at night. Room was okay for the price.
Broken AC, had to open window. Street noise kept us awake.
Stunning views of Louvre! Perfect location, excellent service.
Expensive but unforgettable. Best hotel for sightseeing.
Luxury all the way. Pillows could be better.
Perfect for anniversary. Staff arranged flowers in room.
Central, clean, professional. Ideal for business travelers.
Nice modern hotel. Good breakfast. Walking distance to Sagrada Familia.
Clean and comfortable. Parking available which was great.
Staff spoke good English. Room had strong smell of cleaning products.
Great value. Internet was fast. Would stay again.
Quiet neighborhood. Room size decent. Minor issue with hot water.
Atmospheric area! Historic building, creaky floors.
Loved the Gothic Quarter. Noise from bars until 2am.
Central location, lots of restaurants nearby. Small room.
Felt like a scam - photos showed larger room. Still decent.
Charming but noisy. Good for young travelers who like nightlife.
Steps from the beach! Perfect for families. Clean pool.
Sea view worth it. Breakfast buffet excellent.
Beach access amazing. Room a bit humid, AC helped.
Great for summer vacation. Crowded in August but expected.
Relaxing stay. Staff helpful with beach recommendations.
Clean and cozy hostal near Plaza Mayor. Great value for Madrid.
Basic but comfortable. Staff very friendly and helpful with directions.
Small room but excellent location. Walking distance to everything.
Simple rooms, good location. Perfect budget option in Madrid center.
Clean bathrooms, shared kitchen useful. Could hear neighbors sometimes.
Great for short stays. Close to Prado and Retiro Park.
Modern Ibis style. Good breakfast. Near Prado Museum.
Comfortable beds, quiet room. Slightly far from Gran Via but manageable.
Family friendly. Staff spoke good English.
Right in the heart of Madrid! Tons of restaurants nearby.
Basic hostal but unbeatable location. Room was small but clean.
Good value. Could walk to Sol, Gran Via, Plaza Mayor.
Fun hostel in Chueca! Great for young travelers. Rooftop bar amazing.
Noisy at night from bars - expected in Chueca. Private room was decent.
Social atmosphere. Met lots of people. Beds comfortable.
Huge hostel, modern design. Rooftop terrace with great views.
Private room was spacious. Bar downstairs can be loud.
Good for groups. Walking distance to Gran Via and Malasa√±a.
Amazing location steps from Plaza Mayor! Rooftop bar is fantastic.
Boutique hostel feel. Clean, stylish. Beds comfy.
Best hostel location in Madrid. Worth the extra euros.
Clean hostal near Sol. Staff helped with taxi to airport.
Simple but adequate. Central location made up for small room.
Good value in prime location. Would stay again.
Lovely apartment with kitchen. Perfect for longer stay.
Spacious, clean, well equipped. Heart of Madrid.
Like having your own place. Super central. Highly recommend.
Cozy guesthouse. Friendly host. Near Gran Via.
Shared bathroom was clean. Good for budget travelers.
Quiet street, comfortable bed. Walkable to major sights.
Nice apartments near Royal Palace. Full kitchen.
Spacious for Madrid standards. Bit far from Sol but nice area.
Good for families. Self catering convenient.
Great hotel right at Plaza Mayor. Modern rooms, good breakfast.
Perfect location for sightseeing. Staff professional.
B&B quality. Clean, comfortable. Would return.
Stylish hotel near Puerta del Sol. Rooms well designed.
Excellent central location. Breakfast had good variety.
Modern and clean. Walking distance to everything.
Steps from Puerta del Sol! Couldn't ask for better location.
Basic hostal but unbeatable spot. Room small but functional.
Right in the action. Noisy at night but expected.
On Gran Via! Perfect for shopping and nightlife.
Clean hostal, friendly staff. Views of the busy street.
Central and affordable. Room had everything we needed.
Near Atocha station - perfect for day trips. Clean and simple.
Good if you're catching early train. Room adequate.
Bit far from center but metro nearby. Budget friendly.
Stunning design hotel! Rooftop pool incredible. Luxury experience.
Worth every euro. Best hotel in Madrid. Impeccable service.
Ultra modern, art everywhere. Restaurant excellent.
NH quality on Gran Via. Comfortable, professional. Great views.
Prime location for shopping. Rooms spacious for Madrid.
Reliable chain. Good breakfast. Would stay again.
Excellent location near Sol. Elegant rooms, great service.
Perfect for business or leisure. Central and comfortable.
Classic Madrid hotel. Walking distance to everything.
Right at Puerta del Sol. Premium location, great rooms.
Catalonia quality. Rooftop terrace lovely.
Perfect base for Madrid. Professional staff.
Hip hotel in Soho. Design-focused, trendy area.
Great restaurants nearby. Room stylish and comfortable.
Vincci never disappoints. Good for nightlife lovers.
Room Mate design - fun and modern. Great central location.
Stylish rooms, friendly staff. Near shopping and sights.
Boutique feel. Comfortable beds. Would recommend.
